name: Bean Fight
description:
this is a very buggy 2 player game I made the main gameplay loop in 2 hours and made some better visuals in the following days this project may be very buggy because I just used this as an opportunity to experiment

CONTROLS : 

Player 1 

WASD to move and F to attack

PLayer 2 

ARROW KEYS to move and L to attack

if using Xbox controller

D-pad to move and X to attack
